Metadata.Title: CVE-2025-32049 affecting package libsoup for versions less than 3.4.4-12
Metadata.Description: CVE-2025-32049 affecting package libsoup for versions less than 3.4.4-12. A patched version of the package is available.

Criterion.Comment: Package libsoup is earlier than 3.4.4-12, affected by CVE-2025-32049
